member.name: MIB_UDP6TABLE
member.summary: TheMIB_UDP6TABLE structure contains the User Datagram Protocol (UDP) listener table for IPv6 on the local computer.

member.name: MIB_UDP6TABLE.dwNumEntries
member.summary: The number of entries in the table.

member.name: MIB_UDP6TABLE.table
member.summary: A pointer to an array of structures.
